Master Gobie: (Reads the documents carefully.) Hmm... Good job... I will analyze the information you collected and draft further orders for you... (Master Gobie scribbles a note.) Here, take this letter to Captain Bathis of the Town of Gludio and return to me. While you deliver this, I will dispatch our elite Xekerin Troops to capture Tak, a staff officer of the Ol Mahum. Go quickly!
